name: servaan
description: سِروان - سیستم مدیریت داخلی کافه و رستوران

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend" "npm run dev:admin-backend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:admin-frontend" "npm run build:admin-backend"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:admin-frontend" "npm run test:admin-backend"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd src/prisma && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf src/frontend/node_modules && rimraf src/backend/node_modules && rimraf src/admin/frontend/node_modules && rimraf src/admin/backend/node_modules
